hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah:the Prophet (ﷺ) said "When three persons are together, then no two of them should hold secret counsel excluding the third person

chapter.ara-name: باب لاَ يَتَنَاجَى اثْنَانِ دُونَ الثَّالِثِ
chapter.eng-name: No two persons should talk secretly excluding a third person
